title: Wudu water left in nostrils if mixed with mucus & swallowed, will it break Salah? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: secondly she says that if a person blows pulls water up his nostrils and blows the water out and some water remains mixed with the musculus mucus and during salat he swallows it would that invalidate his salad there's no problem in that insha allah it's not the best thing to do it's not healthy but it does not invalidate your salat and allah azza knows best so we have you
